name: NEON Woody plant vegetation structure
description:
This data product contains the quality-controlled, native sampling resolution data from in-situ measurements of live and standing dead woody individuals and shrub groups, from all terrestrial NEON sites with qualifying woody vegetation. The exact measurements collected per individual depend on growth form, and these measurements are focused on:

enabling biomass and productivity estimation,
estimation of shrub volume and biomass
calibration / validation of multiple NEON airborne remote-sensing data products.
In general, comparatively large individuals that are visible to remote-sensing instruments are mapped, tagged and measured, and other smaller individuals are tagged and measured but not mapped. Smaller individuals may be subsampled according to a nested subplot approach in order to standardize the per plot sampling effort.

Structure and mapping data are reported per individual per plot; sampling metadata, such as per growth form sampling area, are reported per plot.

spatialCoverage.name: NEON Domain area D01: Northeast USA

variableMeasured.name: date
variableMeasured.description: Date or date and time of measurement, observation, or collection event

variableMeasured.name: individualID
variableMeasured.description: Domain-level unique identifier for an individual: NEON.MOD.D##.######

variableMeasured.name: taxonID
variableMeasured.description: Species code, based on one or more sources

variableMeasured.name: scientificName
variableMeasured.description: Scientific name, associated with the taxonID. This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined

variableMeasured.name: recordedBy
variableMeasured.description: An identifier for the technician who recorded the data

variableMeasured.name: plotType
variableMeasured.description: NEON plot type in which sampling occurred: tower, distributed or gradient

variableMeasured.name: nlcdClass
variableMeasured.description: National Land Cover Database Vegetation Type Name

variableMeasured.name: decimalLatitude
variableMeasured.description: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of the geographic center of the reference area

variableMeasured.name: decimalLongitude
variableMeasured.description: The geographic longitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of the geographic center of the reference area

variableMeasured.name: treesPresent
variableMeasured.description: Indicator of whether the plot contains trees of any size

variableMeasured.name: shrubsPresent
variableMeasured.description: Indicator of whether the plot contains shrubs, saplings, or small trees

variableMeasured.name: lianasPresent
variableMeasured.description: Indicator of whether the plot contains lianas

variableMeasured.name: totalSampledAreaTrees
variableMeasured.description: Total plot area sampled for single and multi-bole trees

variableMeasured.name: totalSampledAreaShrubSapling
variableMeasured.description: Total plot area sampled for saplings, shrubs, and small trees

variableMeasured.name: totalSampledAreaLiana
variableMeasured.description: Total plot area sampled for liana
